docs.snippet: Ukrainian Foreign Minister Dmitri Manuilsky, courteous and affable, but just as tight-lipped regarding questions on his country's policies as his fellow Soviet diplomats, arrived here yesterday on the Cunard White Star liner Queen Elizabeth. He will...
docs.lead_paragraph: Ukrainian Foreign Minister Dmitri Manuilsky, courteous and affable, but just as tight-lipped regarding questions on his country's policies as his fellow Soviet diplomats, arrived here yesterday on the Cunard White Star liner Queen Elizabeth. He will be president of the United Nations Security Council.

headline.main: MANUILSKY SPEAKS ON PALESTINE ISSUE; Ukrainian Says He Has 'Greatest Sympathy for Both Sides' -- Here to Head U.N. Council

docs.snippet: The Rev. Dr. Harold H. Kelley, director of the Seamen's Church Institute of New York for the last fourteen years, will retire on Aug. 31, the institute announced yesterday. Dr. Kelley, who is 65 years old, plans to return with his wife to California,...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Rev. Dr. Harold H. Kelley, director of the Seamen's Church Institute of New York for the last fourteen years, will retire on Aug. 31, the institute announced yesterday. Dr. Kelley, who is 65 years old, plans to return with his wife to California, his home state.
docs.abstract: Rev Dr H H Kelley to retire; por

headline.main: Shipping News and Notes; Director of the Seamen's Church Institute to Retire Aug. 31

docs.snippet: SAN FRANCISCO, June 19 -- Caucuses foreshadowing discussion of a proposed new world convention, or treaty, guaranteeing freedom of association and the rights of workers and employers to organize were held here today by delegates to the International...
docs.lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, June 19 -- Caucuses foreshadowing discussion of a proposed new world convention, or treaty, guaranteeing freedom of association and the rights of workers and employers to organize were held here today by delegates to the International Labor Conference. Committee sessions dealing with the subject are to begin Monday.
docs.abstract: ILO draws up treaty text granting employers and employes right to join organizations of their own choosing

headline.main: RIGHT TO ORGANIZE ASKED FOR TREATY; International Labor Meeting in San Francisco Looks to Employer Freedom, Too

docs.snippet: SAN FRANCISCO, June 24 -- Foreign enemies of the Marshall Plan have sought unsuccessfully to persuade the workers of western Europe that their interests are "being sacrificed to provide bigger and better markets for the United States," George A....
docs.lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, June 24 -- Foreign enemies of the Marshall Plan have sought unsuccessfully to persuade the workers of western Europe that their interests are "being sacrificed to provide bigger and better markets for the United States," George A. Isaacs, British Minister of Labor and National Service, asserted here today.
docs.abstract: Dir Gen Phelan rept discussed; Ceylon seeks membership

headline.main: BRITON STRESSES WESTERN FREEDOM; Isaacs Tells ILO Conference That Most Unions Cooperate With Marshall Plan

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: THAT trip you've been looking forward to all spring and saving up for all winter may end up as a pleasant summer joyride, but for the stewards, hostesses and pursers who go along as nursemaids to the traveling public it's just a sweet little headache...
docs.lead_paragraph: THAT trip you've been looking forward to all spring and saving up for all winter may end up as a pleasant summer joyride, but for the stewards, hostesses and pursers who go along as nursemaids to the traveling public it's just a sweet little headache with all expenses paid.
